Hello, I'm Daniel Ochoa

System's Engineer and
programmer

I've a passion for learning how systems work and creating new things. Since I was 12 I started being curious about how web pages were made and created some very basic sites using a service to make websites easily: "Own free website".

In the last years I've been improving my skills and I've found my career really interesting, with lots more applications than I've ever imagined.
